metadata.title: CVE-2015-4556 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The string-translate* procedure in the data-structures unit in CHICKEN before 4.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash).

notes.note: sbeattie> will be fixed upstream in 4.10

criterions.comment: chicken package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
